titleInfo.title: Mr. and Mrs. Paul Edwin Dozier wedding reception, 1941 April 10

mods.identifier: RG 412 230 Wedding Mr and Mrs Paul E Dozier April 1941 002

location.physicalLocation: Metropolitan Nashville/Davidson County Archives, Nashville Public Library

mods.abstract: Mr. and Mrs. Paul Edwin Dozier are pictured at the reception at the Womanâ€™s Club, Thursday evening, which followed their wedding at the First Church of the Nazarene. Mrs. Dozier is the former Miss Loraze Duncan, daughter of Mr. and Mrs. A. P. Duncan. Forms part of Record Group 412, Photographs Collection. 1 photograph negative : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
